headline: Michigan approves incentives transfer after GM exits EV battery plant
summary: A state of Michigan board overseeing economic development deals has approved the transfer of incentives for a $2.5 billion electric vehicle battery plant in Lansing after General Motors Co. exited the project.

raw.headline: Michigan approves incentives transfer after GM exits EV battery plant
raw.summary: A state of Michigan board overseeing economic development deals has approved the transfer of incentives for a $2.5 billion electric vehicle battery plant in Lansing after General Motors Co. exited the project.

headline: Hyundai to announce $20B investment in U.S., CNBC reports
summary: Hyundai (HYMTF) is set to announce a $20B investment in U.S. onshoring that includes a $5B steel plant in Louisiana, people familiar with the plans told CNBC’s Seema Mody. The new steel plant will produce next-generation steel that will be used by Hyundai’s two U.S. auto plants to manufacture electric vehicles, the report noted. The investment is expected to be announced Monday at the White House by President Donald Trump, Hyundai Chairman Euisun Chung and Louisiana Gov. Jeff Landry, CNBC added.
